data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos have now been confirmed.
The first-half is just kicking off.
In the minute 1, Free kick for Portimonense in the half of Gil Vicente.
Welinton Junior (Portimonense) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball safe as Gil Vicente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 3, Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Gil Vicente.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in the half of Portimonense.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Barcelos.
In the minute 5, Antonio Nobre awards the home team a throw-in.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
Gil Vicente awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Miullen of Gil Vicente smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
Can Gil Vicente capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Portimonense's half?
Samuel Dias Lino for Gil Vicente gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 10, Goal kick for Portimonense at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Gil Vicente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Portimonense at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
In the minute 13, Ball goes out of play for a Portimonense goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Portimonense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 16, Portimonense have a goal kick.
In Barcelos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Welinton Junior of Portimonense is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 19, Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
Throw-in Gil Vicente.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
In the minute 22, Portimonense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Portimonense are coming forward and Welinton Junior gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Antonio Nobre awards Gil Vicente a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Portimonense at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Goal kick for Gil Vicente at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Antonio Nobre awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 26, Throw-in Portimonense.
Ball safe as Gil Vicente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Portimonense in their own half.
Corner awarded to Portimonense.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelos.
In the minute 30, Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
Ball goes out of play for a Portimonense goal kick.
In the minute 31, Can Gil Vicente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portimonense's half?
Free kick Gil Vicente.
Portimonense have been given a penalty...
In the minute 36, A massive blow for Portimonense as Lucas misses from the spot.
Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
In the minute 38, Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
Important block from the Portimonense defence as Antoine Leautey fires in a strike for Gil Vicente.
Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
In the minute 40, Portimonense have a goal kick.
Antonio Nobre awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Gil Vicente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 42, Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
Antonio Nobre signals a Gil Vicente throw-in in Portimonense's half.
Gil Vicente to take a throw-in in Portimonense territory.
In the minute 43, Antonio Nobre signals a throw-in for Gil Vicente, close to Portimonense's area.
Throw-in for Portimonense at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, In Barcelos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Antonio Nobre awards Portimonense a goal kick.
The first-half is over at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Portimonense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Portimonense make their first substitution with Anderson de Oliveira da Silva replacing Lucas.
The away team have replaced Julio Cesar with Koki Anzai. This is the second substitution made today by Paulo Sergio.
In the minute 46, Aylton Boa Morte is replacing Welinton Junior for Portimonense at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Portimonense to take a throw-in in Gil Vicente territory.
In the minute 47, Antonio Nobre signals a Gil Vicente throw-in in Portimonense's half.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
In the minute 50, Samuel Dias Lino is on target to give Gil Vicente a 1-0 advantage.
That's a fine assist from Antoine Leautey.
Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Koki Anzai (Portimonense) gets a yellow card.
Free kick Gil Vicente.
In the minute 54, Antoine Leautey (Gil Vicente) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
Corner awarded to Portimonense.
In the minute 55, Portimonense drive upfield and Aylton Boa Morte gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Gil Vicente defender.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Gil Vicente.
In the minute 59, Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Portimonense just outside Gil Vicente's area.
Nogueira (Gil Vicente) has received a first yellow card.
Paulo Sergio is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos with Beto replacing Pedro Sa.
Portimonense's Lucas Fernandes misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 60, Gil Vicente have a goal kick.
Throw-in Portimonense.
The match at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos has been interrupted briefly for a check on Miullen, who is down injured.
In the minute 62, Gil Vicente’s Miullen is on his feet again at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Antonio Nobre awards the home team a throw-in.
Miullen, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Leandrinho is the substitute for Gil Vicente.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Gil Vicente.
In the minute 64, Fali Cande for Portimonense has been booked by Antonio Nobre and receives a first yellow card.
Attention is being given to Gil Vicente’s Antoine Leautey and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 65, Paulo Sergio (Portimonense) is making a fifth substitution, with Henrique Gelain replacing Fali Cande.
Gil Vicente's Antoine Leautey is back in action after a slight knock.
Gil Vicente's Samuel Dias Lino breaks free at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 66, Antonio Nobre awards Portimonense a goal kick.
Throw-in for Portimonense close to the penalty box.
Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
In the minute 70, Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Portimonense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gil Vicente's half?
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to Portimonense.
Corner awarded to Portimonense.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 74, At Estadio Cidade de Barcelos, Anderson de Oliveira da Silva has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Dener of Portimonense gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 75, Ball goes out of play for a Gil Vicente goal kick.
Boubacar Hanne (Gil Vicente) has replaced the possibly injured Antoine Leautey.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in the half of Portimonense.
Antonio Nobre signals a Gil Vicente throw-in in Portimonense's half.
In the minute 77, Throw-in Portimonense.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Rodrigao Prado is replacing Lucas Mineiro for Gil Vicente at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
The home team have replaced Samuel Dias Lino with Lourency. This is the fourth substitution made today by Rui Almeida.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in the half of Portimonense.
Gil Vicente to take a throw-in in Portimonense territory.
In the minute 81, Gil Vicente's Leandrinho gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Barcelos Portimonense attack through Aylton Boa Morte. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Gil Vicente at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Portimonense.
In the minute 85, Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
Portimonense push forward at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos and Anderson de Oliveira da Silva gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Gil Vicente defence.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelos.
In the minute 87, In Barcelos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Portimonense.
Gil Vicente needs to be cautious. Portimonense have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 89, Can Portimonense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gil Vicente's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Gil Vicente at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Portimonense in their own half.
Gil Vicente have a goal kick.
Portimonense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Portimonense to take a throw-in in Gil Vicente territory.
Portimonense are pushing forward but Dener's finish is wide of the goal.
Antonio Nobre awards Gil Vicente a goal kick.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Gil Vicente.
That's full-time at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos. The final score is 1-0.
Lourency (Gil Vicente) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
